body: If more than one effect word causes the wordspell to deal damage, the total number of dice of damage the wordspell can deal can be no greater than the wordspell's caster level. The caster can decide which dice belong to which effect word, in any combination, so long as the total number does not exceed his wordcaster level and the number of dice allocated to a specific effect word does not exceed its maximum.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Words of Power/Casting Wordspells/Multiple Effect Words and Damage
name: Multiple Effect Words and Damage
